name: Runaway Groom
description: You assume the role of the sixty-seven-year-old Calvin Harris, a life-long pastor within the Diocese of El Paso, tasked with officiating the wedding of the son of one of your longtime parishioners. But unfortunately, the soon-to-be husband has vanished without a trace, mere moments before vows are exchanged. As time continues to pass, the guests grow restless and you are tasked with getting the wedding back on track. Decide how you, Pastor Harris, will save the wedding gone haywire, if at all. The choice is yours.
